h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Immortal Blessing Gourd location
content: With both of these bosses defeated, at the start of Chapter 5, you can return to the Shen Monkey Vendor to buy the Immortal Blessing Gourd.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Immortal_Blessing_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Immortal Blessing Gourd', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Immortal Blessing Gourd location'.
The content is as follows:
With both of these bosses defeated, at the start of Chapter 5, you can return to the Shen Monkey Vendor to buy the Immortal Blessing Gourd.
